concept.title: 231.205-19 INSURANCE AND INDEMNIFICATION.

conbody.p: (e) In addition to the cost limitations in FAR 31.205-19(e), self-insurance and purchased insurance costs are subject to the requirements of the clauses at 252.217-7012, Liability and Insurance, and 252.228-7001, Ground and Flight Risk.
